originalText.text:
Dr Friedman is Heaven Sent !!

After years of Pelvic Pain and numerous misdiagnosed outcomes not to mention the closet full of meds thats did nothing but cause anxiety and a list of side effects . I finally found Dr Friedman that took his time patience and dedication to finally have a answer and a diagnoses for my condition as opposed to all the Doctors that felt it was Psychosomatic  .

Rather then handing me a prescription pad of meds . Dr Friedman was very thorough , caring and reassuring that '' we '' can get through this !!

I recommended Dr Friedman to my daughters and girlfriends !!!

He is the real true and honest meaning of what a Doctors should all be !

Words cant describe what a wonderful Doctor and Human Being he is .

Thank you Dr Friedman

Ruth H

originalText.text: he himself found a problem in my female body.  But no treatment was prescribed, and did not even take a smear.  Only a waste of time and health.  On his part, only irony and sarcasm about my health problems!  he is a terrible doctor!and now I have a really bad pain and need again go to gynecologist! Waste time!!!

originalText.text: Dr. Friedman couldn't care less about his patients. If you want a doctor who's actually looking to help you, rather than make everything worse, keep looking and don't waste your time; this man is an absolute nightmare.

text.text: Dr. Friedman couldn't care less about his patients. If you want a doctor who's actually looking to help you, rather than make everything worse, keep looking and don't waste your time; this man is an absolute nightmare.

originalText.text: So professional and patient. Answers all questions and is very calming when discussing sensitive issues.
